## Configuration


```{r knitr}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  autodep        = TRUE,
  cache          = TRUE,
  cache.comments = FALSE,
  cache.path     = "cache/features",
  echo           = TRUE,
  error          = FALSE,
  fig.align      = "center",
  fig.height     = 5,
  fig.width      = 5,
  message        = FALSE,
  timeit         = TRUE,
  warning        = FALSE
)
```

```{r pacman}
pacman::p_load(
  SingleCellExperiment
)
```

## Processed

```{r}

mat <- readSparseCounts(here("data/external/exprMatrix.tsv.gz"))

col <- read_tsv(here("data/external/meta.tsv"))

pca <- read_tsv(here("data/external/Seurat_PCA.coords.tsv.gz"), col_names = c("Cell", "D1", "D2"))

map <- read_tsv(here("data/external/Seurat_UMAP.coords.tsv.gz"), col_names = c("Cell", "D1", "D2"))

sce <- SingleCellExperiment(assays(counts = mat))

```
